channel.title: Compile error@@@Picture inside@@@
channel.description:
I copied the full guide for codefasga.com, to work on a mute system, I copied it fully and i got this error.
Many Thanks James.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 09:07:44 AM[/size][hr]bad tut.?

item.title: Compile error@@@Picture inside@@@
item.dc:creator: @getsome getsome
item.description:
@getsome wrote:

	if(command.toLowerCase().startsWith("mute") && playerRights >=1)
{
	PUBLIC boolean muted = false;
	String split[] = command.split(" ");
	String name = split[1];
	int id = server.playerHandler.getID(name);
	server.playerHandler.players[id].muted = true;
	server.playerHandler.players[id].sendMessage("You have been muted!");
	}

try this

Read full topic

item.title: Compile error@@@Picture inside@@@
item.dc:creator: @musicmad441 Musicmad
item.description:
@musicmad441 wrote:

ok, ill send you my code.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 10:36:32 AM[/size][hr]boolean muted = false;

that was the bit it told me to add to:

if(command.toLowerCase().startsWith("mute") && playerRights >=1) boolean muted = false; {ADDED HERE { String split[] = command.split(" "); String name = split[1]; int id = server.playerHandler.getID(name); server.playerHandler.players[id].muted = true; server.playerHandler.players[id].sendMessage("You have been muted!"); }

James.
